name: Six-shooter Pistol
description: A basic pistol with decent stopping power.

name: Bandages
description: Basic medical supplies. Can be used to heal wounds.

name: Whiskey
description: Strong liquor that can ease pain or bolster courage.
usageEffect: Discard to heal D3 sanity or gain +1 to your next roll

name: Leather Duster
description: A long coat offering some protection against the elements and attacks.

name: Lucky Coin
description: A special coin that seems to bring good fortune.
